price: Kugeza ubwo dufashe abadamaraye muri bo tukabahana, nuko bagatangira guca bugufi batabaza.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهِم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمۡ يَجۡـَٔرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā akhadhnā mut'rafīhim bil-ʿadhābi idhā hum yajarūna
